value:
$WmMPID_ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You want to know if I'm strong, huh?
Why answer with words when I can
answer with a fight? Let's go!$k$p

$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|$w0|My father trained me in the sword
from childhood. If I've mastered the
weapon, I shouldn't lose to anyone.$k$p

$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I shall lose no battle. I will prove my
strength to you here and now.
Prepare to face me!$k$p

$WmMPID_バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_Normal,Face|$w0|The name's Bartre, and I aim to
become the strongest man alive!
Just watch me get stronger!$k$p

$WmMPID_ハロルド,ch05_08_Harold_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Haha! Prepare to be dazzled and
awestruck by unrivaled strength!$k$p

$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Me? Strong? If you say so. I'm just
looking to make it home alive.$k$p

$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|$w0|It is a knight's duty to protect the
people, so we must uphold justice
and honor. I must become stronger...$k$p
